attributes.action: Work More Closely with Think Tanks from All Political Parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are various think tanks in the UK aiming to improve life for British citizens, but from different angles (e.g. left, right, centre, green, etc.).  These think tanks do a lot of valuable work that shoud be exploited by government for the good of the country and for the good of all UK citizens.  Government should liaise with all think tanks with a view to gaining maximum value from their efforts.
